name: issue_id
description: The unique identifier of the issue.

name: creator_id
description: The identifier of the person who created the issue.

name: created_at
description: The timestamp indicating when the issue was created.

name: issue_type
description: The category of the issue, such as Bug or Story.

name: issue_description
description: A detailed explanation of the issue.

name: issue_status
description: The current status of the issue (e.g., Active, Resolved).

name: severity
description: The level of impact the issue has: 1-Critical, 2-High, 3-Medium, 4-Low.

name: discussion
description: Comments or discussions related to the issue.

name: resolution
description: The action taken to resolve the issue.

name: linked_issues
description: Other issues that are linked or related to this issue.

name: owning_team
description: The team responsible for resolving the issue.

name: affected_version
description: The software version affected by the issue.

name: affected_service
description: The system or service impacted by the issue.

name: escalation_manager
description: The person responsible for managing the issue escalation process.
